answer:
If you are unable to find any of your records, you are considered unimmunized. The recommended vaccines for adults in British Columbia can be found here.  Publicly funded (Free) vaccines are available from most pharmacies, some doctors' offices and local health units. Use the health unit finder to find a health unit near you.
Immunization Nurse
question: 32 year old male recent immigrant from Mexico. No immunization history and would like to get full vaccine protection especially for measles due to family contact with newborn.
